actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that pensions paid to retired law enforcement officers shall not be subject to the income tax.

summary.text: Provides that pensions and retirement benefits paid to retired law enforcement officers shall not be subject to income tax under the Internal Revenue Code of 1954. (Amends 26 U.S.C. 123)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that pensions paid to retired law enforcement officers shall not be subject to the income tax.
